film.title: Inception
film.description: A skilled thief who accesses people's dreams to steal secrets is offered a chance to erase his past if he can successfully implant an idea into a target's subconscious.

film.title: The Dark Knight
film.description: Batman faces his most formidable foe, the Joker, whose chaotic philosophy tests Gotham's moral limits and challenges Batman’s resolve.

film.title: Interstellar
film.description: A group of astronauts travels through a wormhole near Saturn in search of a new habitable planet as Earth faces ecological collapse.

film.title: The Matrix
film.description: A hacker learns that his reality is a simulation and joins a rebellion against the machines controlling humanity.

film.title: Forrest Gump
film.description: A kind-hearted man with a low IQ unwittingly influences several major historical events throughout his extraordinary life.

film.title: Titanic
film.description: A young aristocrat falls in love with a free-spirited artist aboard the RMS Titanic, leading to a tragic romance during the ship’s fateful voyage.
